author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 30-year-old man died after a sewage tanker rammed his motorcycle on Pallavaram-Thoraipakkam Radial Road, near Kovilampakkam, on Tuesday.

Mohanraj of Kovilampakkam was proceeding to Perungudi when the accident took place, traffic police said.

He was thrown off the vehicle and he came under the wheels of the tanker and died instantly, the police said.

St. Thomas Mount traffic investigation police rushed to the spot and took the body to Tambaram Taluk Government Hospital in Chromepet for a post-mortem examination.

A case has been registered and hunt has been launched for the lorry driver, who abandoned the vehicle and fled the scene.
title: Sewage tanker rams motorcycle, man killed
